rukus.text: abeulaham-ui jongyeongbadneun sonnim-uiyaegiga geudaeege ileuleossneunyo
geudeul-i geuege pyeong-anhasoseo lago insahani geudo pyeong-anhasoseolago alji moshan geudeul-ege insahadeo la
geuttaeneun jaeppalli geuui jib-an-eu lo deul-eoga saljjin song-aji hanmalileul gajyeowa
geugeos-eul geudeul ap-e noh-eumyeonseo deusiji anhgessseubnikka lago malhayeossdeola

geudeul-i meogji anihaja geuneun geudeul-eul dulyeowo hayeossnola ittae geu deul-i dulyeowo haji mallago malhamyeo geuege chongmyeonghan adeul-i iss-eul geos-i laneun gippeun sosig-eul jeonhayeossdeola
ittae keuge us-eumyeo geuui anaega dagawa geunyeoui imaleul ttaelimyeo neulg-go bul-im-ui yeoseong-i aeleul gajneundan mal-iyo lago malhamae
geudeul-eun junimkkeseo geuleohge mal sseum-i iss-eoss-euni sillo geubun-eun jihye wa asim-eulo chungmanhasim-ila daedabhayeossdeola
geuga sajadeul-iyeo dangsindeul ui yongmuneun mueos-ibnikka mul-euni
geudeul-i malhagil ulineun joeag e ppajin baegseong-ege bonaeeojyeo
geudeul wie chalheulg-ui dol-eul bisbalcheoleom bonaeni
geugeos-eun joejieun jadeul-ege ju nim-ui pyosiga jjeoghyeo bonaejin geos-ila hadeola
geuttae hananim-eun geugos-e iss-eossdeon mid-eum-eul gajin sindodeul-eul guhanola
geuleona hananim-eun han gajeong oeeneun eotteon museullimdo balgyeonchi moshayeo
museoun jingbeol-eul dulyeowo haneun geudeul-eul wihae geugos-e yejeung-eul namgyeo dueossnola
mose-ui iyagi sog-edo yejeung i issnani bola hananim-eun geuege myeongbaeghan gwonneung-eul jueo palao-ege bonaessnola
geuleona geuneun geuui gundaewa deobul-eo oemyeonhamyeo geuneun masulsainga animyeon michin jainga lago malhayeoss deola
geulihayeo hananim-eun geuwa geu ligo geuui gundaeleul pohoeghayeo bada sog-e deonjyeoss-eumae geue daehan binan-eun dang-yeonhaessdeola
adeuui baegseong sog-eseodo yejeung i issnani bola hananim-i geudeul-e ge pamyeol-ui balam-eul bonaess-euni
balam-i bul-eossdeon gos-eneun amugeosdo namgyeojin geos-eobs-i jaecheoleom pagoe doeeo beolyeossdeola
samudeu baegseong sog-eseodo yejeung i iss-eoss-euni bola jamsidong-an hyanglag hagoja hayeoss-eudoe
geudeul-eun junim-ui myeonglyeong-eul geoyeog hayeoss-eumae jikyeobodeon jingbeol-ui gwang-eum-igeudeul-eul myeolmangke hayeossdeola
geudeul-eun il-eoseol sudo eobs-eossgo seuseuloleul bohohal sudo eobs-eossnola
geudeul ijeon-ui noaui baegseongdo geulaess-euni geudeuldo saaghan baegseongdeul-ieossnola
